content: Hello! Welcome to my website. I’m Viktor Demychev. How can I assist you today?
Nice to meet you, t2000! How can I help you today? Whether you have questions about my professional experience, my work in MLOps, or something else, feel free to ask!

I’m Viktor Demychev, an MLOps engineer based in Düsseldorf, Germany. With about 8 years of experience in IT management and quality assurance, I’ve worked in various roles, including in the gaming industry and the military. I'm passionate about machine learning operations, LLM integration, and staying updated on technology trends. If you have any specific questions or topics you'd like to discuss, I'm here to help!
